title: I may seem nuts but,
content:
This is serious. Isolap, you work for Club Penguin do you not? Well, me and 263 other penguins were wondering if you could get rid of a pengiun named Dark Lord. And not the 2 day ban, a permenit one. I told you, I may seem nuts. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] ___________________________________________

title: Re: I may seem nuts but,
content:

btw what is this penguin thing? I think penguins are awesome!! :-)-Genius314

title: Re: I may seem nuts but,
content:
Yeah, e-mail the Club Penguin team/support instead! I'm not sure if Ilsoap works there or only designed stuff. Really dunno..

Genius; Club Penguin is a kind of virtual world where you have a penguin as your avata. Check out: [url=http://www.clubpenguin.com/]www.clubpenguin.com/[/url]3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
